problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O with radius N_0 at points A and B. The straight line CD intersects PA and PB at points C and D respectively, and it is tangent to ⊙O at point E. When PO = N_1, the perimeter of the △PCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OB,∵PB是⊙O的切线,∴∠PBO=90°,∴PB=√{PO^{2}-0B^{2}}=4,∵PA、PB分别与⊙O相切,∴PA=PB=4,∵CD分别交PA、PB于点C,D,并切⊙O于点E,∴DE=DB,CE=CA,∴△PCD的周长=PC+CD+PD=PC+CA+DB+PD=PA+PB=8,故选:C．
